entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
